chapters.title: Chapter 14:  A Vow
chapters.info: Car'a'carn, p. 202—According to the Prophecy of Rhuidean, the man destined to unite the clans of the Aiel. The term means “Chief of Chiefs” in the Old Tongue. The Car'a'carn, according to the Prophecy, would be announced to the Aiel by not one, but two dragons on his forearms upon leaving Rhuidean. The Car'a'carn has arrived in the person of Rand al'Thor. See also al'Thor, Rand.
